scripts.ci: CI=true npm run check && CI=true npm run test
scripts.precheck: npm -w web run extract && npm -w web run lingui
scripts.check: npm run check:format && npm run check:types && npm run check:lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf cli/build components/build extension/build projects/build runner/build simulator/build web/build
scripts.format: prettier --write cli/src components/src extension/src projects/src runner/src simulator/src web/src web/public
scripts.fix: eslint --fix cli/src components/src extension/src projects/src runner/src simulator/src web/src web/public
scripts.check:format: prettier --ignore-unknown --check cli/src components/src extension/src projects/src runner/src simulator/src web/src web/public
scripts.check:lint: eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern cli/src components/src extension/src projects/src runner/src simulator/src web/src web/public
scripts.build: CI=true npm run build -w projects && CI=true npm run build -w runner && CI=true npm run build -w simulator && CI=true npm run build -w cli && CI=true npm run build -w components && CI=true npm run build -w web && CI=true npm run build -w extension
scripts.test: CI=true npm test -w simulator && CI=true npm test -w components && CI=true npm test -w web
scripts.preinstall-cli: npm run build -w projects && npm run build -w runner && npm run build -w simulator && npm run build -w cli
